/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the urban landscape of the city. On the right side of the street, there's a construction site, indicating ongoing development in the area. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the greenery of the trees and shrubs contrasting against the grey of the buildings and the blue of the sky.
